meanings.definition: Present or proffer (something) for (someone) to accept or reject as desired.
meanings.sent1: She offers a helping hand to her friend in need.
meanings.sent2: He offers his seat to the elderly lady on the bus.
meanings.sent3: The cat offers a toy mouse as a gift to its owner.
meanings.sent4: The sun offers its warm rays to the flowers, helping them grow.
meanings.sent5: The store offers a wide selection of products for customers to choose from.

meanings.definition: Provide or supply (something) for (someone) to use or benefit from.
meanings.sent1: The restaurant offers a free dessert with every meal.
meanings.sent2: The library offers a quiet place for students to study.
meanings.sent3: The tree offers shade to the tired hiker on a hot day.
meanings.sent4: The river offers fresh water to the thirsty animals in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The company offers training programs for its employees to improve their skills.

meanings.definition: Express readiness or willingness to do something for someone.
meanings.sent1: She offers to help her neighbor carry groceries into the house.
meanings.sent2: He offers to drive his friends to the airport early in the morning.
meanings.sent3: The child offers to share his toys with his younger sibling.
meanings.sent4: The teacher offers extra help to students who are struggling with the lesson.
meanings.sent5: The volunteer offers her time to assist at the local community center.
